    • Constructor Detail

      • DoorWay

        public DoorWay(Game game,
               int x,
               int y,
               java.awt.image.BufferedImage[] images,
               boolean vertical,
               int room)
        Constructs the DoorWay entity.
        Parameters:
        game - object containg all the objects and variables.
        x - the x position of the door in pixels.
        y - the y position of the door in pixels.
        images - the image of the door.
        vertical - if the door is vertical or horizontal.
        room - the index of the room the player gets sent to if they interact with the door.
